skillTree.name: Skeletal Steed
skillTree.description: Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.

skillTree.name: Skeleton Chariot
skillTree.description: The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.

skillTree.name: Khemrian Warsphinx
skillTree.description: Giant leonine statues, almost impervious to harm; they wade through foes, crushing them like bothersome insects.

skillTree.name: Returned in Madness
skillTree.description: The pain of immortal misery, coupled with insane violence, characterises the return to Unlife for many of the Tomb Kings, who fight longer, harder and better than they ever could before.

skillTree.name: Ancient Tyrant
skillTree.description: You cannot build an empire without sacrificing a few sonsâ€¦

skillTree.name: Embalmed in Elixir
skillTree.description: The fluid used to embalm the Tomb King toughens his bindings, enabling him to withstand a greater degree of damage than would otherwise be possible.

skillTree.name: Ceremonial Bandages
skillTree.description: Soaked in and toughened by embalming fluid, the cloth bindings used to mummify afford the wearer additional protection from all but a direct hit from mortal projectiles.

skillTree.name: Ptra the Great Father
skillTree.description: Symbolising immortality and eternity, the ruler of the Nehekharan Pantheon has always had a care for the wellbeing of his children.

effects.description: Leadership: +8 for Tomb Guard and Chariot units
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Tomb Princes
Melee defence: +8 for Tomb Guard and Chariot units

skillTree.name: Geheb the God of Earth
skillTree.description: "They stand staring into the sun for eternity, the physical embodiment of the everlasting gods. Terrible ye who looked into their divine forms!"

effects.description: Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
Melee attack: +5 for Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
Melee defence: +5 for Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units

skillTree.name: Usirian the God of the Underworld
skillTree.description: Those who oppose the faceless God of the Underworld shall suffer terribly, condemned to its lowest levels for eternity.

effects.description: Missile strength: +15% for Casket of Souls units

skillTree.name: Asaph the Goddess of Magic & Vengeance
skillTree.description: They who serve the Asp Goddess are blessed with a precise aim with which to reach their objectives.

effects.description: Missile strength: +12% for Skeleton Archers and Sepulchral Stalkers units

skillTree.name: Indomitable Will
skillTree.description: It is not possible to defeat such unshakeable spirit once its owner's mind is made up.

skillTree.name: Conqueror
skillTree.description: Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Tombstrike
skillTree.description: He whose will transcends death can strike out from beyond the grave, to devastating effect.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Over My Dead Body
skillTree.description: Death is not an impedance to the strongest of wills.

skillTree.name: Desertstrike
skillTree.description: Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.

skillTree.name: Passage to the Soul Realm
skillTree.description: The promise of a glorious afterlife worthy of a courageous warrior keeps embattled troops focused on the grim task at hand.

skillTree.name: Arrows of Asaph
skillTree.description: Carrying the blessing of the goddess Asaph, these arrows seek out the foe with unerring accuracy.

effects.description: Ammunition: +8% for Skeleton Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units
Ammunition: +12% for Skeleton Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units
Missile strength: +9% for Skeleton Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units
Ammunition: +20% for Skeleton Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units
Missile strength: +12% for Skeleton Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units

skillTree.name: Sun-Scorched Bones
skillTree.description: Death isn't necessarily the end; those who have pledged service must rise to fight again another day.

effects.description: Armour: +6 for Nehekhara Warriors, Tomb Guards, Skeleton Warriors and Spearmen units
Armour: +9 for Nehekhara Warriors, Tomb Guards, Skeleton Warriors and Spearmen units
Melee defence: +5 for Nehekhara Warriors, Tomb Guard, Skeleton Warriors and Spearmen units
Armour: +12 for Nehekhara Warriors, Tomb Guards, Skeleton Warriors and Spearmen units
Melee defence: +8 for Nehekhara Warriors, Tomb Guard, Skeleton Warriors and Spearmen units

skillTree.name: Elite Cavalrymen
skillTree.description: Formed by long campaigns and bloody slaughter in the stifling desert heat, the bond between steed and rider cannot be broken, even when death tries to intervene.

effects.description: Speed: +6% for Necropolis Knights, Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen and Skeleton Horse Archers
Weapon strength: +9% for Necropolis Knights, Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen and Skeleton Horse Archers
Missile strength: +9% for Skeleton Horse Archers units
Speed: +9% for Necropolis Knights, Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen and Skeleton Horse Archers
Weapon strength: +12% for Necropolis Knights, Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen and Skeleton Horse Archers
Missile strength: +12% for Skeleton Horse Archers units
Speed: +12% for Necropolis Knights, Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen and Skeleton Horse Archers

skillTree.name: Master Charioteers
skillTree.description: "The swift charioteers of the king. They who pursue the sovereign's foes on the day of his awakening."

effects.description: Charge bonus: +6 for Khemrian Warsphinx, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
Charge bonus: +9 for Khemrian Warsphinx, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
Melee attack: +6 for Khemrian Warsphinx, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
Reload time reduction: +9% for Khemrian Warsphinx, Skeleton Archers Chariot units
Charge bonus: +12 for Khemrian Warsphinx, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
Melee attack: +8 for Khemrian Warsphinx, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
Reload time reduction: +12% for Khemrian Warsphinx, Skeleton Archers Chariot units

skillTree.name: Revered Stonemasonry
skillTree.description: Simple stone is afforded more respect than other materials, for from its grain giant guardians are hewn, brought to shuddering life by the Liche Priests' sorcery.

effects.description: Melee defence: +4 for Hierotitan, Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
Melee defence: +6 for Hierotitan, Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
Melee attack: +6 for Hierotitan, Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
Missile strength: +9% for Ushabti (Great Bow) units
Melee defence: +8 for Hierotitan, Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
Melee attack: +8 for Hierotitan, Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
Missile strength: +12% for Ushabti (Great Bow) units

skillTree.name: Stone Sentinels
skillTree.description: Not even stone is set in stone it seems â€“ arcane death magic is used to bring tortured, savage vigour to once-dormant stone sentinels.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +6 for Sepulchral Stalkers, Necrosphinx and Tomb Scorpion units
Charge bonus: +9 for Sepulchral Stalkers, Necrosphinx and Tomb Scorpion units
Melee attack: +6 for Sepulchral Stalkers, Necrosphinx and Tomb Scorpion units
Charge bonus: +12 for Sepulchral Stalkers, Necrosphinx and Tomb Scorpion units
Melee attack: +8 for Sepulchral Stalkers, Necrosphinx and Tomb Scorpion units
Weapon strength: +12% for Sepulchral Stalkers, Necrosphinx and Tomb Scorpion units

skillTree.name: Reanimate
skillTree.description: It takes an iron will and unnatural - supernatural - strength to rally bound troops routed by magical means.

skillTree.name: Blessing of the Asp
skillTree.description: Arrows loosed under the ever-watchful eye of the Serpent Goddess find their marks with divine precision.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10% for Skeleton Archers, Ushabti (Great Bow), Skeleton Horse Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile strength: +12% for Skeleton Archers, Ushabti (Great Bow), Skeleton Horse Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units (Rank 7 and above)
Ammunition: +15% for Skeleton Archers, Ushabti (Great Bow), Skeleton Horse Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Dune Rider
skillTree.description: The desert itself is his steed.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen, Sepulchral Stalkers, Necropolis Knights, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +5 for Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen, Sepulchral Stalkers, Necropolis Knights, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
Physical resistance: 5% for Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen, Sepulchral Stalkers, Necropolis Knights, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Unfading Memory
skillTree.description: A dream of glory attained through conquest great rages still, despite the dying of the light.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10% for Nehekhara Warriors, Skeleton Warriors, Skeleton Spearmen and Tomb Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +10 for Nehekhara Warriors, Tomb Guards, Skeleton Warriors and Spearmen units (Rank 7 and above)
Speed: +10% for Nehekhara Warriors, Skeleton Warriors, Skeleton Spearmen and Tomb Guard units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Ancient Stone
skillTree.description: The very strength of the desert, to stand sentinel over the Tomb Kings' domain and crush their enemies to dust.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Ushabti, Tomb Scorpion, Hierotitan, Necrosphinx and Khemrian Warsphinx units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +12% for Ushabti, Tomb Scorpion, Hierotitan, Necrosphinx and Khemrian Warsphinx units (Rank 7 and above)
Magic resistance: 15% for Ushabti, Tomb Scorpion, Hierotitan, Necrosphinx and Khemrian Warsphinx units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Resurrect
skillTree.description: Dark litanies are uttered to restore the Tomb Kings' slain soldiers to a twisted, chattering imitation of life.

ui_effects.description: âž• Restores up to 480 Hit Points

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Sand Sweeper
skillTree.description: Some of war's spoils are more difficult to see but are just as valuable as gold or jewels.

skillTree.name: Soul Reaper
skillTree.description: This one scours the battlefields, plains and dunes for the vanquished dead, so that his armies may march at full strength once more.

skillTree.name: Canopic Jar Hoarder
skillTree.description: These jars contain the remains of many Liche Priests, which are useful for raising and binding a new force.

skillTree.name: Attend Me!
skillTree.description: Nehekhara's mummified rulers are awake, their eyes burning with balefire, their thirst for power, conquest and vengeance every bit as strong as they were in life.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Imperishable
skillTree.description: By which the Undead armies of Nehekhara may remain deathless, undying and forever hungry for slaughter.

effects.description: Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -35% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: All is Mine!
skillTree.description: To the victor, the spoils. All of them. Always.

skillTree.name: The Dead Sand Sentinel
skillTree.description: It stands watch over the land, lest the foe's insidious, opportunistic agents dare to strike.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: Renowned among their allies and feared by enemies both mortal and otherwise, this Lord's every deed adds to their already legendary reputation.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Strategist
skillTree.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

skillTree.name: Strong
skillTree.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Master of Ceremony
skillTree.description: "Revered One, Venerable One, Lord of Secrets, High Priest of the Temple of Yearsâ€¦"

skillTree.name: Trustworthy
skillTree.description: The people of the desert live and die by their oaths in Basth's graceful sight.

skillTree.name: Treacherous
skillTree.description: The God of the Scorpions protects the venal, the perfidious, and the downright murderous.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Tomb Scorpion units
Melee defence: +5 for Tomb Scorpion units

skillTree.name: Wrathful
skillTree.description: The Tomb Kings and their servants feel Khsar's wrath coursing through their Unliving veins.

skillTree.name: Prepared
skillTree.description: Unlife is forever; it is therefore prudent to go willingly and prepared.

skillTree.name: Eternal
skillTree.description: Time itself cannot harm those who have defied death.

skillTree.name: Scavenger
skillTree.description: The Vulture-God assists the desert poozler, lest they lose their way 'neath the scorching desert sun.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +20%
When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

ui_effects.description: âž• Activates automatically when conditions are met
âž– Weak vs a single combatant
